question: Conflict arises due to differences in _____ and _____ among individuals.
_____ is a common cause of conflict in organizations, especially when resources are scarce.
_____ conflicts occur due to misunderstandings, personality clashes, or differing work styles between individuals.
_____ conflict arises when different departments or levels of the organization have disagreements.
_____ conflict occurs when people from different backgrounds or cultures have differing values or communication styles.
_____ is one of the most common causes of conflict in organizations, where information is not shared effectively.
The collaborating conflict management style focuses on finding a _____ solution that satisfies everyone involved.
_____ strategy involves working together to find a win-win solution, fostering trust and creativity.
_____ strategy involves one party giving in to the other to keep the peace, often at the expense of their own needs.
_____ strategy involves sidestepping the conflict, either by ignoring it or withdrawing from the situation.
